author: agartha
body:
Soo..

Lets say there were a website on TOR browser.
Where a person who want to make money on him eating food or fighting a bear or having Cage fighting.. Or sex?

On a live webcam? Can do it!

How? Easy!
Let's say he or she?!? Will say I want too share my day on Disney world and I have a camera with me.. So a place a time on this event and have them ready a link where this payment should be( Bitcoin) and private!

So they will have it ready by a code too this link where this person can live watch this person on Disney! And this code can only be used by SINGEL IP gate!

So!

If people can make money on sharing things on Internet then I think I'm sure on the money here for Bitcoin!

My guess is that this will make Bitcoin price go crazy!

I have all the ideas, plans and how too do it!

I need support :) and help!

What scares me little is that this can become some form of HOSTEL shit?!

And if it does and media picks it up then it's GG for Bitcoin!
Everything can happen! But the security has to be TOP! Better then CHAT ROULETTE! With all the pedofile and it's still on that's crazy!

We will do a better work too insure this type of crazy shit doesn't happened!

However if people want too have dog fight or cook fight that's a thing that needs too be discussed.

And a lot of more topics :)

So...

What do you think of this website that you can make money on you having sex, fighing, eating food, and muuuch more!

With a private website and a private identity and ofc with a private wallet to receive and send Bitcoin from.

I'm not saying it's all perfect here :) I will need help and I'm all ears here :)

What do people think ?

Agatha white.



Maybe I'm wrong to even have this idea.. I don't know. And yes I have seen some creepy things going on because of this subject.
title: PRIVATE PATMENT CAM

author: agartha
body: We say we are community but we don't work As one! What if Bitcoin had one day to do commercial. How? Easy! If everyone agrees on doing commercial about the Bitcoin halving and that is going to rise! Like last time ;) like always! So.. Let say the 5 September there will be an event! ( the day has been changed ) Spam it everywhere! Facebook tweet Instagram talking to friend etc! The hole day is bitcoin announcement day! Even posters or signs or even hacking is commercial ;) We have to be more then 100+ members so do your part and share this to have more members to have a Bitcoin announcement Day! Shear this so WE can be the elit team who controlls the market and not the market controlling us.

author: agartha
body: China is buying Bitcoin. Bitfinix one of the largest Bitcoin exchange in the world( in China ). So if I'm right then.. The most of the customers that got hacked on bitfinix where Chinese and for that I can say that this has to be some inside job and a new way of controlling the market. If you own the market but not the coin why not own the company of the exchange! And call it a hack. Right ? China vs USA vs economic problem = Huh? Elits around the world are buying gold silver and digital currency's! Why ? I don't know but something is about to happen anytime soon.. Soon there will be a sign on Btc because of the mining electricity cost. Then the Bitcoin been produce, and the Bitcoin been sold( which is non ) That's your first sign too take out your money from the bank and buy some of them I just told u. Bitcoin will be the start of a global war on money and some might even ban it for its price. So, once again.. China buying Btc and then keeping them on bitfinix was a bad idea! And I think that the true value of Btc is in USA Canada London( Sweden)🙃🤔 What is your thought on this ?
title: Maybe the true story for Bitfinix

author: agartha
body:
China is buying Bitcoin.
Bitfinix is one of the largest Bitcoin exchange in the world( in China ). 

So if I'm right then..
The most of the customers that got hacked on bitfinix where Chinese and for that I can say that this has to be some inside job and a new way of controlling the market. If you own the market but not the coin why not own the company of the exchange! And call it a hack. Right ? 

China vs USA vs economic problem = Huh? 

Elits around the world are buying gold silver and digital currency's! 

Why ? I don't know but something is about to happen anytime soon.. 

Soon there will be a sigh on Btc because of the mining electricity cost.

Then the Bitcoin been produce, and the Bitcoin been sold( witch is non ) 

That's your first sigh too take out your money from the bank and buy someone I just told u.

Bitcoin will be the start of a global war on money and some might even ban it for its price.

So, once again.. China buying Btc and then keeping them on bitfinix was a bad idea! And I think that the true value of Btc is in USA  Canada London( Sweden)🙃🤔
title: China = Bitfinix = Chines customer = war?

author: agartha
body:
We have a plan
I see so many people invest in new test coin ( altcoin ).. Like millions! Why not have one hashtag too donate and that many been invested to commercial by Hollywood actors ! Or artists! 

By using there Facebook tweet Instagram etc.

Bitcoin will hit the media like seconds and will se a rise like AMIGOS! 🚀

Maybe the plan is not the best and can be improved :) but it's a very very good idea for someone to DO THIS! 👌🏼

AND 
 Then the website about them launching a web cam live video and actually getting payed by that can sometimes be even free.

However this is a way of live cam steaming thing. 

Where people will be the producer.

And there can be a lot of topics where even age is needed.. Who knows..

I think that this will hit the media because people having followers on YouTube and them using this website and then sharing there hashtag to watch them. That means that people will use Bitcoin and that will make people want Bitcoin. They will want too become the next BitcoinTune.Com movie ⭐️ 😎 that's something thou! 
😁😄



Here is the link so you can watch the video :) watch it, sorry for my bad English 😇 Haha lol.
